messages.message: Hi John, I reviewed your proposal for the email automation system. Can you provide more details about the CRM integration?

Absolutely! I can integrate with HubSpot, Salesforce, or Pipedrive. The system will sync contact data and track email engagement automatically. Would you like me to prepare a detailed technical proposal?
That sounds perfect. We use HubSpot. Please send the detailed proposal and we can move forward.
Great! I'll send you a comprehensive proposal by tomorrow with timeline, deliverables, and HubSpot integration details. Looking forward to working with you!
Hello! I'm interested in getting started with the inventory automation. Do you have experience with Shopify API?

Hi Sarah! Yes, I have extensive experience with Shopify API and QuickBooks integration. I've built similar systems for 3 other e-commerce clients. When would be a good time to discuss your specific requirements?
